snippet: An independent agency said Friday that it was investigating more than 31,000 complaints of voting irregularities related to automated telephone calls during the last election.
abstract: Elections Canada, independent federal elections agency, says it is investigating more than 31,000 complaints of voting irregularities related to automated telephone calls during the last election.
lead_paragraph: An independent agency said Friday that it was investigating more than 31,000 complaints of voting irregularities related to automated telephone calls during the last election.

headline.main: Canada: Agency Investigates Complaints of Mass Irregularities in 2011 Election
headline.print_headline: Canada: Agency Investigates Complaints Of Mass Irregularities in 2011 Election
